en.label:
This demo highlights how to create engaging, visually rich surveys using image-based questions, media elements, and custom themes.


We’ll start by exploring how to make your questions more visual and interactive—then show you how to personalize your survey's look and feel through theming.


Let's go!
Welcome to Qlarr’s theming and visual experience demo!
Qlarr offers different visual question types that help users respond quickly and confidently. They’re perfect for preferences, comparisons, and visual evaluation.
Single Choice (Image or Icon)
en.description:
Use single choice image or icon questions when you want respondents to select one visual option.

Ideal for product comparisons, mood indicators, or visual preferences.

en.label: Multiple Choice (Image or Icon)
en.description: This format works best when users can select more than one visual option, where images or icons provide context at a glance.

en.label: Single Choice Icon Array
en.description: Display a set of icons across multiple rows to gather structured visual input—great for matrix-style input with a fun, visual twist.

en.label: Image Ranking
en.description: Let respondents tap images to assign a ranking in order of preference.

en.label: Enhance context and interaction with media—without requiring traditional input.
Image or Video Display
en.description: Use display elements to visually support your questions without requiring input. Showcase a product image, play a short intro video, or insert a reference visual to guide respondents before answering.

en.label: Image or Video Capture (offline mode)
en.description: Capture live input by allowing respondents to take a photo or record a short video - especially useful for fieldwork, product testing, or capturing in-the-moment insights. This feature works in offline mode—perfect for collecting data without internet access.

en.label: Display Customization Tip
en.description: For all image and icon-based questions, you can adjust how visuals appear by clicking on the gear icon above each question to change the Display settings, or add a short description to your question through Setup.

en.label: To access Qlarr’s customization tools, click the puzzle icon at the botto right of the screen.
This opens a menu with three powerful options:

Reorder is for rearranging the pages and questions in your survey with a simple drag-and-drop view.

Translation is for setting your survey’s base language and add translations for multilingual audiences.

Theme – this is where the magic happens. Let’s dive in!
Clicking on Theme opens a set of visual controls that let you fully style your survey to match your brand—or simply give it a unique personality.

Choose your font style and adjust sizes for page titles, questions, and body text.

Set your survey’s highlight, background, foreground, and text colors.

Upload a banner or background image to bring your survey to life.
Want more control?
en.description: You’ll also find settings for Navigation options (explained in the Smart Flow demo) and Order and Priority (covered in the Randomization & Sampling demo)

en.label: Now that you’ve explored Qlarr’s visual features, it’s your turn—design surveys that not only ask smart questions, but look good doing it!
